mapper.select: SELECT L.LESSON_ID, (SELECT CONCAT(C.CENTER_NAME, ' ', C.CENTER_LOCATION, '점') FROM CENTER C WHERE C.CENTER_ID = L.CENTER_ID) AS CENTER, L.LESSON_NAME, (SELECT I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR I WHERE I.INSTRUCTOR_ID = L.INSTRUCTOR_ID) AS INSTRUCTOR_NAME, (SELECT CURRENT_PERSONNEL FROM RESERVE_NUMBER R WHERE R.LESSON_ID = L.LESSON_ID AND R.RESERVE_DATE = #{selectDate}) AS CURRENT_PERSONNEL, L.PERSONNEL, L.LESSON_DAY, L.START_TIME, L.END_TIME FROM LESSON L WHERE L.LESSON_DAY LIKE CONCAT('%', #{day}, '%')
SELECT LESSON_ID, CENTER_ID, LESSON_NAME, INSTRUCTOR_ID, PERSONNEL, LESSON_DAY, START_TIME, END_TIME FROM LESSON WHERE LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
SELECT CONCAT(C.CENTER_NAME, ' ', C.CENTER_LOCATION, '점') AS CENTER FROM CENTER C JOIN LESSON L ON C.CENTER_ID = L.CENTER_ID WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
SELECT I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM INSTRUCTOR I JOIN LESSON L ON I.INSTRUCTOR_ID = L.INSTRUCTOR_ID WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
SELECT CURRENT_PERSONNEL FROM RESERVE_NUMBER WHERE LESSON_ID = #{lessonId} AND RESERVE_DATE = #{selectDate}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVE ( LESSON_ID, USER_ID, RESERVE_DATE, CANCELED ) VALUES ( #{lessonId}, #{userId}, #{selectDate}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVE SET CANCELED=1 WHERE RESERVE_ID=#{reserveId}
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_ID, USER_ID, RESERVE_DATE, LESSON_ID FROM RESERVE WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND RESERVE_DATE = #{today} AND CANCELED = 0

SELECT L.LESSON_ID, L.LESSON_NAME, L.PERSONNEL, L.LESSON_DAY, L.START_TIME, L.END_TIME, C.CENTER_ID, C.CENTER_NAME, I.INSTRUCTOR_ID, I.INSTRUCTOR_NAME FROM LESSON L LEFT JOIN CENTER C ON L.CENTER_ID = C.CENTER_ID LEFT JOIN INSTRUCTOR I ON L.INSTRUCTOR_ID = I.INSTRUCTOR_ID WHERE L.LESSON_ID = #{lessonId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVE WHERE LESSON_ID = #{lessonId} AND RESERVE_DATE = #{today} AND CANCELED = 0
